page.title: 16Lower Tadmarton Village (2)
page.content: The small windows are so that in the summer it is cooler and in the winter they are warmer. So it saved the people lot of money. It is a very quiet little hamlet hardly anything happens there. The {population of Lower Tadmarton is 56}. Lower Tadmarton is really part of Tadmarton village which is half a mile up the road. There are 3 farms in Lower Tadmarton, Camp Farm, High Meadow Farm and Lower Tadmarton Farm. The brook runs into the moat of Broughton Castle and then runs into Sor brook. Lower Tadmarton is the kind of place people dream of living in. It is a peaceful place hardly any cars go through it. It has {beautiful rural scenery} and there are lots of lovely paths to walk along. Laura Clelford.
